dataStructure.name: tip.ServiceDefinition
dataStructure.description:
Represents a type of Service Specification introduced for the purposes of Service Fulfillment. It defines ALL the ServiceSpecCharacteristics (SSCs) that must be used to create corresponding Service instances. This includes the SSCs which are: globally set (the corresponding values are defined only in ServiceTemplates and are sometimes designated as invariant ) and set per instance (since the ServiceDefinition does not contain any value for such SSCs, the corresponding values can be defined only over the Activation Interface and are sometimes designated as variant )

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ServiceDefinition

child.name: sdStatus
child.description:
The state of the Service Definition; it may take on one of the following values: Draft, Standard, or Proprietary.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: sdStatus

child.name: activationMode
child.description:
Indicates whether the designed service is activated through provisioning, or is signaled.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: activationMode

child.name: serviceTemplate
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ServiceDefinitionValidates

This association end is optional
child.label: serviceTemplate

child.name: serviceSpecification
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ServiceSpecFurtherDefinedByServiceDefinition

This association end is optional
child.label: serviceSpecification

child.name: saPSpec
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ServiceSpecGainsEntryAt

This association end is optional
child.label: saPSpec
